com.netflix.genie.client

Class CommandServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
      • com.netflix.genie.client.CommandServiceClient

  • public final class CommandServiceClient
extends com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
    Singleton class, which acts as the client library for the Command Configuration Service.
